title: Charles Manson and the Manson Murders by Martin Fido
description:
Charles Manson and the Manson Murders by Martin Fido

The discovery by a maid of the brutally mutilated bodies of Sharon Tate and her friends on Cielo Drive in the Hollywood Hills has left an indelible mark on middle America. Led by Charles Manson, an orphaned 5ft 2in petty criminal turned messiah-like guru, the Manson family of hippy drop-outs randomly went about murdering rich people in the most revolting ways imaginable.
'The Manson Murders' tells the true and compelling story of the depraved Manson and his cohorts.

1. No Name Murdock & Half Assed Thief
2. Forming The Family & Topanya Canyon
3. Helter Skelter & Tate LaBianca
4. More Busts More Bodies & Trials And Convictions
Running time 3hrs and total size 60MB


WARNING - Includes details and descriptions of true murders which some may find offensive or distressing.

You can find more by Martin Fido over at the blog for download. I probably wont be able to torrent them all so grab them there!
